wiktionary_senses.definition: To do as a requirement; indicates that the sentence subject is required as an imperative or directive to execute the sentence predicate, with failure to do so resulting in a failure or negative consequence.
To do with certainty; indicates that the speaker is certain that the subject will have executed the predicate.
Used to indicate that something is very likely, probable, or certain to be true.
Something that is mandatory, required or recommended.
The property of being stale or musty.
Something that exhibits the property of being stale or musty.
Fruit juice that will ferment or has fermented, usually from grapes.
